title: What are the signs of a sealed heart? #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: Yasin from Germany um I wanted to ask you what are the signs of a sealed heart and how can it be opened this requires a lot of elaboration um Yasin nevertheless a sealed heart is a heart that resembles the hearts of hypocrites they don't remember Allah except seldomly so a sealed heart never remembers Allah 24 hours seven days a week watching movies listening to music thinking about music or poetry or anything that does not contain Allah a sealed heart whenever Allah is mentioned there is a form of resentment or hatred whenever Islam the day of judgment death Your Grave Hell Fire he feels agitated and discomfort a Pure Heart is enlightened with such topics and looks up to it and looks forward to it a sealed heart would negatively reflect on your actions so you skip Salat you relate to Salat you don't pay attention to mandatory obligations usually you are totally depressed and confused and nothing would fulfill you temporarily except watching movies or engaging in Haram acts the moment you quit you get these negative thoughts back again the owner of a sealed heart usually is rude is arrogant disrespectful to the elders and to his parents among many many signs and Allah azzawajal Knows Best
